name: Horror Zombies VR
description:
Horror Zombies is a scary virtual reality horror game. Armed with your chainsaw and a couple guns, see how long you can survive against the zombie horde.
You are locked in a haunted mansion. Kill zombies with your gun and chainsaw. Be sure to plug in headphones for spatial vr audio. Try it with a VR Headset or without one! Comaptible with google cardboard and many other virtual reality headsets. You can also play without one.

Be prepared to be scared in the zombie simulation VR game. Don't become a zombie.


Controls
Non VR HMD
Rotate your phone to look around and the d-pad to move around. Touch the chainsaw to zombies to kill them. You can also shoot them long range by tapping the screen.

VR HMD
Touch the screen or cardboard trigger button to shoot and long hold to move forward
